info.title: B2B/B2C E-Commerce API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API for B2B and B2C e-commerce platform with multi-currency support, dealer management, advanced product catalog, and domain-based security. The API provides both public endpoints (for catalog browsing) and protected endpoints (for user-specific operations).
